programmes.show_description: Trans-Fat: Anarchic animated sitcom. Peter is mistakenly identified as transgender which leads to an unexpected event and him learning an important lesson.
Demolition Daddy: Snot discovers that his late father was a demolition derby driver who used to partner one of Roger's personas. Elsewhere, Hayley takes Steve on a road trip.
Stompe Le Monde: Stan buys the rights to a Broadway show after inheriting money. Soon, the family travel town to town, selling their show, but never performing it.

programmes.show_name: New: The Real Housewives of Orange County
programmes.show_description: Going Dutch: Reality show. Shannon hosts an elaborate bridal lunch for Jenn before the ladies head to Amsterdam and cruise the canals as they indulge in the city.

programmes.show_name: New: The Real Housewives of Orange County
programmes.show_description: Tulip Service: Reality show. The Amsterdam trip continues as the ladies visit the famous tulip fields and Jenn and Shannon's friendship is called into question.

House of the Nightmare Witch: Spooky animated adventures. Velma and Hotdog Water work for Mr E to retrieve a museum exhibit from Moscow. But the exhibits come to life!
The Night the Clown Cried II: Tears of Doom!: Animated adventures. Crybaby Clown is back with a vengeance, kidnapping the citizens of Crystal Cove - including Daphne!
Renn Scare: Animated adventure series. The gang heads to Velma's beloved authentic Renaissance Faire and must find a way to infiltrate the royal feast to stop an evil court jester.
How to Train Your Coward: Animated adventure series. Finally fed up with monsters and mayhem, Shaggy and Scooby decide to quit the gang and train their replacements on the job.
Lauren Simon: TV Personality Lauren Simon is going to be given five menus, each put together by a potential blind date.

programmes.show_name: Billie and Greg: The Family Diaries
programmes.show_description: Reality series. The Shepherds continue to soak up the Abu Dhabi sun as they finally reveal their baby news to the world before returning home to a launch party.
Reality series. Everyone heads to the beach club to celebrate the last day in Cyprus, but Harry is in no mood to celebrate after learning about Junaid's feelings for Joe.
Nuevos Horizontes: US reality series. Lisa navigates a new relationship while battling through her divorce, and Alexia hosts a party in hopes of bringing the group back together.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programmes.show_description: Re-Lentless Erika: US reality series. Crystal's Taco Tuesday heats up when Denise's return brings back Erika's fiery side, and Sutton gets in tune with a new date.
Kirby: Culinary-themed dating series. Kirby from London chooses three dates based on the menus they have planned. Who will she want to see again?
James Lock: TV personality James Lock is given five menus, each of which has been put together by a potential blind date... but who will he want to see for seconds?
Reality series. Emotions run high after Harry and Joe call time on their relationship, and Jodie makes it clear that Diags needs to spend more time bonding with her son Bear.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Orange County
programmes.show_description: Hoedown Throwdown: Reality show. Emily's western-themed fundraiser for the Innocence Center goes from hoedown to showdown when Gretchen and Slade confront Tamra.
Champagne Confessions: US reality series. Marysol hosts a boozy gay brunch, and Guerdy reveals to her girlfriends that she has breast cancer and reaches a breaking point with Larsa.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programmes.show_description: A Celebration of Life: US reality series. The women head to Ojai for Annemarie's birthday, and Kyle hosts a celebration of life event for a late friend of hers.
Stephen Mulhern hosts the classic game show as Richard Arnold, Danny Miller, and Rachel Stevens all try to guess the well-known phrases from the animated clues in aid of charity.
Join Stephen Mulhern as Mark gets his chance to take on the Banker and finds out if his box contains a life-changing amount of money or the 1p lurking inside.

programmes.show_name: New: The Real Housewives of Orange County
programmes.show_description: A Source of Discontent: Reality show. Gina struggles with a rumour that has been circulating, leading to a confrontation during the ladies' final Amsterdam dinner.
There are just days left to go and the Love Island All Stars are making the most of every moment of their magical winter of love, but the legends face plenty more twists and turns.
Strong Women: Documentary series. Olivia explores the earning power of strong women, from a bricklayer who has made a million pounds to a bodybuilder in the US.
Girl, Internetted: Meg becomes internet famous, leading her and Peter on an adventure as they try to build her following. Elsewhere, Brian and Stewie revel in their new rental car.
Family Guy Lite: After a mishap at work, Peter decides to take his health more seriously and diets with the help of Quagmire, Joe and Cleveland.
Pride Before the Fail: Hayley discovers she is within one credit of graduating college, but tries to fail so she can continue living at home.
Mom Sauce: Steve's life changes when Snot gets rich thanks to his mum selling a new dipping sauce. Elsewhere, Klaus, Stan, Roger and Jeff become mall fashion show models.
Putts-giving: Animated comedy. The Belchers decide to spend a Thanksgiving morning playing mini golf, but the empty course soon becomes a battlefield of emotions for the family.
Comet-y of Errors: Animated comedy. Teddy is uncertain about his love life and destiny and hopes that the return of a comet to the skies will give him a sign from the universe.
Matt Edmondson narrates a funny selection of Guinness World Record attempts, this time featuring the most blowtorches extinguished with the tongue in one minute.

Web of the Dreamweaver: Animated adventures. The gang investigate the mystery of the Dreamweaver, an evil wizard who is causing citizens to destroy the things they love the most.
The Hodag of Horror: Animated adventures. In pursuit of the mythical Hodag beast, the Mystery Inc. gang find something much more valuable - the fourth planispheric disc piece!
Worst in Show: Animated adventure series. When a giant houndbeast attacks an elite dog show, the gang go undercover and enter Scooby in the show in order to solve the mystery.
Mysteries on the Disorient Express: Animated adventure series. Fred is pleasantly surprised to discover a monster mystery on board a mystery-free three-day cross-country train trip.
Garden in the Sky Vancouver: House-hunting show. Estate agent Chantal Vignola takes on the challenge of finding a new Vancouver condominium for her future in-laws Lisa and Blair.
Reality series. Our favourite Essex crew have all headed to Cyprus for some summer sun, but tempers fray and passions boil over with the gang all back together.
Reality series. Amy confronts Joe about his treatment of Harry as the group continue their break in Cyprus, and Elma and Jodie strengthen their bond after confronting Diags.
Reality series. An emotional conversation leaves both Joe and Harry determined to make their relationship work, but a conversation between Joe and Junaid could wreck things yet.
Ryan joins Stephen Mulhern and hopes to be the player who can take a life-changing jackpot home while staying strong against the Banker.
Join Stephen Mulhern as Felix takes to the hot seat hoping to turn the tables and take the Banker for all he's worth.
Uche joins Stephen Mulhern as she opens the famous red boxes in the hope of becoming a jackpot winner and avoiding joining the 1p Club.
Just 33 players remain as Rob Brydon hosts another thrilling edition of quick-fire quiz duels and we learn who will edge closer to victory and the 50,000-pound jackpot.
Firefighting duo Harry and Ben try to cash out with some truly life-changing money before husband-and-wife team Ciaran and Louise try to hold their nerve and avoid crashing out.
